short_summary: Purchasing a Ethylene Oxide Gas Sterilizer
description: Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC), on behalf of  Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada),is issuing this request for proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a Ethylene Oxide Gas-Sterilizer including delivery, installation and training
duration_in_months: He would have 10 months of validity in the start and finish
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal
#### Ethylene Oxide Gas Sterilizer
We are soliciting proposals for the acquisition of a Ethylene Oxide Gas Sterilizer, including delivery, installation, and training, located in Sherbrooke, Quebec, Canada.

**Notice Information**
* Solicitation Reference Number: WS4003771241-Doc4021873454
* Amendment Number: 2
* Publication Date: May 23, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: June 7, 2023 (2:00 PM)
* Amendment Date: June 6, 2023

**Procurement Information**
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Not applicable
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contracting Entity**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**Project Details**
* End User: Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* Project Location: Sherbrooke, Quebec, Canada
* Submission Details: Proposals must be submitted electronically via [link](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16367026?extsite=MTYzNjcwMjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Point of Contact**
Annie Blanchet (SPAC/PSPC)
annie.blanchet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Note: [Please find additional information in the attached documents.](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16367026?extsite=MTYzNjcwMjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

The following UNSPSC code is used: 41100000 (Laboratory and Scientific Equipment).
The deadline to submit solicitations has passed. Please visit the provided link for additional information regarding this project.
